name: Sweet Lama
description:
This is a game where we play for a lama. She very much likes sweet, but unfortunately the more she eats, the more weight she becomes(((

Control:

  •  A,D - move left or right
  •  Space - jump, start game
  •  Mouse Left Button - shoot and air leap
  •  R - restart level

P.S. Mistake in the word lama is specially made. The author so wanted :D
